DOC.criteria: Selfidentify Hispanic 1864 year age BMI 30 50.0 kg/m² Ability participate provide informed consent . Speak , read , write either English and/or Spanish Diagnosis diabetes mellitus History liver disease Current medication glucose control , cholesterol control ; uncontrolled BP Current eat disorder anorexia nervosa , bulimia , etc . ( likely make adherence prescribe beverage intake difficult ) Current alcohol substance abuse Currently treat psychological issue ( i.e . depression , bipolar disorder , etc . ) , take psychotropic medication previous 12 month , hospitalize depression within previous 5 year Report exercise ≥3 day per week ≥ 20 minute per day past 3 month Report weight loss ≥5 % participate weight reduction diet program past 3 month Report plan relocate location limit access study site employment , personal , travel commitment prohibit attendance schedule assessment Report consumption ≥ 1 cup green tea daily willing complete 2 week runin period Report consumption ≥ 1 cup citrus fruit daily willing complete 2 week runin period
